channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 1 Stock-Split AI Stock Up More Than 2,200% That Looks (Sort Of) Cheap
Western trainers who haven't fought anything like the Ukraine war are readying Kyiv's soldiers to fight the Russians. Oddly, it works.
Countries race for late breakthrough in deadlocked plastic pollution talks

Zelenskyy rallies Trump, European allies in setting red lines for Putin summit
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer in London on Thursday as he continued diplomatic maneuvers.

item.title: WATCH: Star of '70s sitcom 'What's Happening!!', Danielle Spencer, dies at 60
item.description: Actress Danielle Spencer, best known for her role as Dee Thomas on the 1970s sitcom "What's Happening!!," has died after a long battle with cancer.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin likely to become Atlantic season's first hurricane by Friday
item.description: Tropical Storm Erin was expected to become a hurricane by Friday, the U.S. National Hurricane Center said.

item.title: California Democrats prepare redistricting effort to counter Texas GOP
item.description: As Texas hurtles toward a flashpoint on a GOP effort to redraw congressional districts, California Democrats are about to answer with a plan of their ...

item.title: Pilot arrested upon landing in Antarctica says he remains stuck after case suspended
item.description: Ethan Guo was accused of illegally landing in a Chilean territory in Antarctica in June.

item.title: As Guard deploys, Trump to seek 'long-term' federal control of DC police
item.description: Forces made 43 arrests on Tuesday night, according to a White House official.

item.title: In juvenile detention, these students say they’re not learning — and it’s keeping them incarcerated
item.description: Florida shifted to virtual learning for youth in juvenile detention — and parents and students say it’s been a disaster.

item.title: 8/13: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Trump says he wants a meeting with Putin and Zelenskyy if Alaska summit goes well; National Guard appears in D.C. as part of Trump’s takeover

item.title: Rabbits in Colorado are sprouting "horns." Here's why.
item.description: Viral photos have inspired a fluffle of unflattering nicknames, including "Frankenstein bunnies," "demon rabbits" and "zombie rabbits."

item.title: Woman killed by falling rocks after summiting world's 2nd-highest peak
item.description: Guan Jing was struck by falling rocks on Tuesday while descending K2, a day after reaching its summit, a government spokesperson said.

item.title: CDC shooting marks latest in a string of hostility directed at health workers. Many aren’t surprised
